BaseTemplate.description: Supplier of chemical products - Laemthong Marketing Chemicals

Index.meta_title: Laemthong Marketing Chemicals Co., Ltd - Industrial Chemical Supplier
Index.meta_description: We specialize in importing and distributing all kinds of chemical products for industrial use and other businesses that require chemicals. Fair pricing and friendly service.

About.meta_description: Industrial chemicals supplier for wastewater treatment, cleaning chemicals, and more.
About.about_paragraph: We import and distribute all kinds of chemical products for industrial use and various other businesses, such as hotels, farms, swimming pools, foundries, drilling, soundproofing, fire protection, home decoration, wastewater treatment, and more. Suitable for all types of industries. Our clientele includes industrial estate clients as well as the general public.
About.about_footer: With fair pricing and friendly service, our customers have trusted our products for a long time. We also provide fast delivery to meet customer demands. For industrial chemicals, lubricants, animal feed additives, and wastewater treatment chemicals, think of Laemthong Marketing Chemicals.

product.meta_description: Supplier and importer of quality chemical products at reasonable prices: talcum powder, graphite, vermiculite, bentonite, and other chemicals for various industries.

About.about_service: We provide consultation on chemical selection and offer express delivery services to factories in industrial estates such as Bang Pu, Bang Phli, Phraek Sa, Theparak, Bang Bo, Bang Pla, Bang Sao Thong, Bang Chalong, King Kaew, Rachathewa, Bang Na-Trad, Sisa Chorakhe, Rom Klao, Lat Krabang, Samut Songkhram, Sam Phran, Om Yai, Om Noi, Nakhon Chai Si, Thonburi, Rama II, Nong Khaem, Bangkok, Hua Mak, Nonthaburi, Sai Noi, Bang Len, Sam Khok, Lat Bua Luang, Lat Lum Kaeo, Bang Chan, Suwinthawong, Nong Chok, Bang Nam Priao, Bang Wua, Chachoengsao, Kabin Buri, Prachin Buri, Nakhon Nayok, Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Saraburi, Samut Sakhon, Maha Chai, Na Di, Sinsakhon, Krathum Baen, Khlong Luang, Pathum Thani, Nava Nakorn, and Bangkadi Industrial Estate.
